about_the_game:
Get Out is a 1-4 player online co-op psychological horror. Complete tasks and puzzles to banish the entities that have you and your team trapped, and make sure to get out, before they get you.



DO YOU HAVE WHAT IT TAKES?

  • Online Co-Op
    Play with up to 4 friends and you all must work together to unlock the clues and complete the puzzles.
  • Replayability
    In Get Out, each playthrough is different, with random spawns ensuring you have a different experience every time.
  • Interesting Puzzles
    Each puzzle flows perfectly into the next one, using not only written clues but also the environment to your advantage.



  • Player Progression
    Completing tasks/puzzles earns you XP, which can be put towards unlocking perks and cosmetics.
  • Increasing Difficulty
    As you progress through the game, the entities get more and more aggressive, increasing not only their speed but also their capabilities.
  • Proximity Chat
    As you progress through the game, the entities get more and more aggressive, increasing not only their speed but also their capabilities.
  • Defeating The Entities
    Not only is your goal to escape, but you will also be able to eradicate the entities that possess wherever you get trapped.
  • Immersive Gameplay
    Get Out is powered by Unreal Engine 5 ensuring the highest quality graphics for the most immersive horror experience possible.


  • Modding Support
    The first update we plan on adding to Get Out we hope to include modding support, as we believe this is a key feature to not only involving the community, but keeping the game alive.
  • VR Support
    After we've included modding, we plan to shift our focus towards VR support for all VR headsets, as we know this will bring another level of immersion to Get Out.
  • Maps, Modes, Unlockables
    In future updates, you can also expect to see many more locations being released, all with their own unique puzzles and styles, along with different game modes to keep Get Out feeling fresh and new.

name: Get Out

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-10100F / AMD Ryzen 3 3100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 760 / AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / Radeon R9 380
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
